mapper.insert: insert into player(PLAYER_SQ, PLAYER_NAME, PLAYER_ID, PLAYER_PASSWORD, PLAYER_BIRTHDATE) values(player_sq.nextval, #{name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{birthdate} )
mapper.select: select * from player where player_id=#{id} and player_password=#{password}
mapper.update: update player set player_name=#{name}, player_password=#{password}, player_birthdate=#{birthdate}, player_introduction=#{introduction}
update player set player_url=#{STORED_FILE_NAME} where player_sq=#{playSq}
mapper.select: select player_url from player where player_sq=${value}
mapper.update: update player set player_bg_url=#{STORED_FILE_NAME} where player_sq=#{playSq}
mapper.select: select player_bg_url from player where player_sq=${value}
mapper.insert: insert into visitor(visitor_sq, player_sq, visitor_subject, visitor_content) values(visitor_sq.nextval,#{playSq},#{subject},#{content})
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as rnum,visitor_sq,player.player_sq,visitor_subject, visitor_content, visitor_time,player_name,player_id,player_url,player_bg_url from visitor,player where visitor.player_sq = player.player_sq) WHERE rnum > = #{start} AND rnum < = #{end} order by visitor_sq desc
